name: Humanizer: Dezombification Game
description:
Humanizer is simple tower-defense game created for the 14th Mini Jame Gam! This prototype currently features 2 different enemies and one large boss enemy. The boss zombie holds a flag that speeds up nearby zombies. You have various towers at your disposal to reverse the outbreak of the zombie apocalypse and survive!

While there isn't much "game" here, this project was an amazing learning experience for us as a team. We hope you'll get at least some enjoyment out of the game and look forward to our future projects!

Credits:
